sys_update_xml.payload: c.top-section { padding: 30px 40px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; background: #f5f5f5; position: relative; .dots-img { position: absolute; width: 30%; left: 28%; top: 32%; } .avatar-div { width: 50%; } .icon-div { width: 50%; justify-content: center; text-align: center; p { color: #81878e; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; } .selected-number { font-size: 15px; color: #2e90f8; font-weight: 600; margin-left: 5px; } } .svg-icon { width: 50px; height: 50px; stroke: #268cf8; fill: #268cf8; } }sp_instancetruepe-overview-card-snippetfalsePE Overview Card Snippetfalsefalsesp_widgetfabio.petito2017-03-10 19:41:00true0976bee71315b200d15e3d7ed144b05b44PE Overview Card Snippetglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_0976bee71315b200d15e3d7ed144b05bsteven.gregory2017-06-01 23:28:34
